name: DSTableViewWithDynamicHeight
summary: DSTableViewWithDynamicHeight is a UITableView subclass that automatically resizes its cells to fit their content.
description:
DSTableViewWithDynamicHeight inherits UITableView and automatically adjust the
                   height for all cells. It automatically resizes all standard cell types. If you
                   want it to handle your custom cell, make it implement DSTableViewCellWithDynamicHeight.
